alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 5:14AM CST until February 09 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Rockwall, Hunt and Kaufman Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan. * WHEN...From early this morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Moderate out of bank flooding will occur. Some farm and cattle industries will be flooded. Some rural roads will be underwater. Water will be over the road and the FM 1565 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 17.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
